name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and frequent travelers.

name: Smart Fitness Tracker Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and sleep tracking. Water-resistant and compatible with iOS and Android.

name: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV 55-inch
description: Crystal-clear 4K television with smart features and voice control. Includes streaming apps and multiple HDMI ports.

name: Wireless Smartphone Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED charging indicator.

name: Premium Laptop Backpack
description: Durable waterproof backpack with laptop compartment and multiple organizational pockets. Perfect for students and professionals.

name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt Pack
description: Soft breathable cotton t-shirts in assorted colors. Perfect for everyday wear and casual occasions.

name: Designer Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with advanced cushioning and breathable mesh. Ideal for athletes and daily exercisers.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel bottle that keeps drinks hot or cold for hours. Eco-friendly and BPA-free.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Beautiful set of 4 ceramic mugs with comfortable handles. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Memory Foam Bath Mat
description: Super absorbent memory foam bath mat that provides comfort and safety. Machine washable and quick-drying.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Non-slip yoga mat with excellent cushioning and alignment markers. Perfect for yoga and exercise routines.

name: Adjustable Dumbbell Set
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells with quick-change weight system. Ideal for home workouts.

name: Camping Tent 4-Person
description: Weather-resistant camping tent with easy setup design. Spacious interior with multiple windows.

name: The Great Gatsby Hardcover
description: Classic American novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald in beautiful hardcover edition. Perfect for collectors.

name: Python Programming Guide
description: Comprehensive guide to Python programming for beginners and intermediate developers. Includes practical examples.

name: Digital Camera 24MP
description: Advanced digital camera with 24 megapixels and 4K video recording. Perfect for photography enthusiasts.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting and ergonomic design. Long battery life.

name: Organic Cotton Bed Sheets
description: Soft organic cotton bed sheets in various sizes and colors. Hypoallergenic and breathable.

name: Stainless Steel Cookware Set
description: Complete 10-piece cookware set with even heat distribution. Oven safe and dishwasher friendly.

name: Basketball Official Size
description: Official size basketball with durable construction and excellent grip. Ideal for indoor and outdoor play.

name: Hiking Backpack 35L
description: Spacious hiking backpack with multiple compartments and hydration system. Comfortable for long hikes.

name: Cookbook: Healthy Recipes
description: Collection of 100 healthy and delicious recipes with nutritional information. Beautiful photography.

name: Tablet 10-inch Android
description: Versatile Android tablet with high-resolution display and long battery life. Perfect for work and entertainment.

name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
description: Compact Bluetooth speaker with impressive sound quality and waterproof design. Perfect for outdoor use.

name: Designer Sunglasses
description: Stylish sunglasses with UV protection and polarized lenses. Available in multiple frame colors.

name: Leather Wallet with RFID
description: Genuine leather wallet with RFID blocking technology. Multiple card slots and bill compartment.

name: Aromatherapy Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with color-changing LED lights. Creates relaxing atmosphere.

name: Resistance Band Set
description: Set of 5 resistance bands with different tension levels. Includes carrying bag and exercise guide.

name: Mystery Novel Bestseller
description: Gripping mystery novel by acclaimed author. Twists and turns that keep readers engaged.

name: Children's Picture Book
description: Colorful picture book with engaging story and beautiful illustrations. Perfect for young readers.
